command.label: Build Modal Implication Graph
command.tooltip: Builds a graph with all non-core features and computes the transitive hull.

command.label: Set as Current Configuration
command.tooltip: Only the current configuration is build

command.label: Derive Partial Feature Project with this Configuration
command.tooltip: Use the selected Configuration to derive a Partial Feature Project

shortcut.description: Runs JUnit test cases on a product with and a product without the feature (if possible).
shortcut.label: Run as JUnit Integration Test
